channel.title: ARGA? Real OR 100% BULLSHIT
channel.description: I heard a new bot is Comming arga, made by Taios, so im trying to figure out if its bullshit and if it is real, is it going to be realeased to the public?

item.title: ARGA? Real OR 100% BULLSHIT
item.dc:creator: @Pie_0wnz Pie 0wnz
item.description:
@Pie_0wnz wrote:

[quote=“daycrawler, post:34, topic:6630”][quote author=BlackThursday link=topic=9121.msg118087#msg118087 date=1154566078]

its not bull, there just lazy

no they just are unable to finish anything they start.
They change the bot every few weeks.
first wrapping, then reflection, then bcel, then deobs, now they are modifying something new and are looking toward color recognition.

funniest thing was the screenshots of the the gui coded in visual basic.

What they dont realize is i already made a color recogntion.

Lol, if you say so.

funniest thing was the screenshots of the the gui coded in visual basic.

LMFAO. There was a plan in vb. Then there was the real thing. If you looked at the arga leak you would see the semi of the real thing. The leak didnt have the final one i dont think because i realised anyone could download from our svn and so closed it lol.

They change the bot every few weeks

Yup and it hasnt been changed again. We are on the final one. Its in full runtime, no runescape.jar no having to update. <3 pplsuqbawls

No we do not use deobs wtf? We never ever have out of all our changes. Ive posted code for deobs but thats for others. You were asking me about them and i was saying how bad they were and why not to use them, in the end i said just do what you like. I believe you are working on a deob’d bot now?

are looking toward color recognition.

Stuff color reconition, we want things done by Ids’, Names etc for example, attackNPC(String name). Nice idea though, we wil have color reconition aswell, wont hurt.

The app section is now done by some mods, not by me, i didnt have the time to get all the apps done.

The bot is free and no, not public. Its only going to be given to people who write tuts, contribute and help out, aka non leachers. We dont want another Aryan thankyou ;).

Ruler the bot is in runtime & BCEL and has been for a month.

now they are modifying something

? We dont modify anyting in the rs client so by what are you referring?

The bot is not just by me. It is by Zappacky, Iamadam, VirtualMaster, aswell.

Whether you think the bot is bs or not, it up to you. It wont stop it coming out.

Lol, and yes we are generally quite lazy =P.

Ruler i even end up giving you the npcArray that you were after for so long…

Rome wasnt built in a day.

Toodles.

Hmm… sounds close. Better make the preparations to leech it before anyone else does…

mwahahaha. I mean to say:

How may I obtain and Auth?
[/quote]
Apply and be active, even then you most likely will still have to pay or something like that.[/quote]
I will p00n the quotes…

Read full topic

I talk to all your devs, i give them code. I have offered assistance. they seem a bit fragmented on what is going on.
Sorry the vb screenshots were offical and were posted on fagex and your own site so i assumed they were the bot.

Zappacky talks about getting scar source and colors. that is COLOR RECOGNTION…
I don’t think you know what some members of your team are planning.

now they are modifying something

[code]

(7:11:56 AM) Zappacky: or

(7:12:19 AM) Eric: or windows side

(7:12:40 AM) Zappacky: so

(7:21:29 AM) Eric: so its hard to follow

item.title: ARGA? Real OR 100% BULLSHIT
item.dc:creator: @Taios Taios
item.description:
@Taios wrote:

[quote=“ruler, post:12, topic:6630”][quote author=Ollie link=topic=9121.msg101486#msg101486 date=1154169731]
its not bull, there just lazy
[/quote]
no they just are unable to finish anything they start.
They change the bot every few weeks.
first wrapping, then reflection, then bcel, then deobs, now they are modifying something new and are looking toward color recognition.

funniest thing was the screenshots of the the gui coded in visual basic.

What they dont realize is i already made a color recogntion.[/quote]

Lol, if you say so.

funniest thing was the screenshots of the the gui coded in visual basic.

LMFAO. There was a plan in vb. Then there was the real thing. If you looked at the arga leak you would see the semi of the real thing. The leak didnt have the final one i dont think because i realised anyone could download from our svn and so closed it lol.

They change the bot every few weeks

Yup and it hasnt been changed again. We are on the final one. Its in full runtime, no runescape.jar no having to update. <3 pplsuqbawls

No we do not use deobs wtf? We never ever have out of all our changes. Ive posted code for deobs but thats for others. You were asking me about them and i was saying how bad they were and why not to use them, in the end i said just do what you like. I believe you are working on a deob’d bot now?

are looking toward color recognition.

Stuff color reconition, we want things done by Ids’, Names etc for example, attackNPC(String name). Nice idea though, we wil have color reconition aswell, wont hurt.

The app section is now done by some mods, not by me, i didnt have the time to get all the apps done.

The bot is free and no, not public. Its only going to be given to people who write tuts, contribute and help out, aka non leachers. We dont want another Aryan thankyou ;).

Ruler the bot is in runtime & BCEL and has been for a month.

now they are modifying something
? We dont modify anyting in the rs client so by what are you referring?

The bot is not just by me. It is by Zappacky, Iamadam, VirtualMaster, aswell.

Whether you think the bot is bs or not, it up to you. It wont stop it coming out.

Lol, and yes we are generally quite lazy =P.

Ruler i even end up giving you the npcArray that you were after for so long…

Rome wasnt built in a day.

Toodles.

Read full topic
